description: No ice cream maker required! All you need is five ingredients and a blender for this decadent raw vegan chocolate ice cream.
name: No Churn Raw Vegan Chocolate Ice Cream
recipeIngredient: 1-14 oz. can coconut cream or coconut milk (refrigerated overnight (the longer, the better)
1/2 cup cacao powder (could sub cocoa powder, but it won't be raw)

recipeInstructions.text: Open the can of coconut milk or cream and scoop the cream into blender, discarding the water.
Add remaining ingredients to blender and blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of pitcher as needed.
Transfer to sealed freezer safe container and freeze until solid, about 4-6 hours.
Allow to sit out for about 10 minutes prior to scooping.
